Sentencas: Electrode performance in solid oxide fuel cells is strongly affected by its microstructure characteristics.
Titulo: Representative volume element size for accurate solid oxide fuel cell cathode reconstructions from focused ion beam tomography data

Sentencas: A three-dimensional reconstruction of a mixed-conducting La0.58Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3-delta (LSCF)-cathode is introduced, which gives a detailed description thereof.
Titulo: Representative volume element size for accurate solid oxide fuel cell cathode reconstructions from focused ion beam tomography data

Sentencas: At first, the multistep procedure of FIB/SEM (focused ion beam/scanning electron microscopy) tomography is analyzed, error sources are identified and measures taken against are presented.
Titulo: Representative volume element size for accurate solid oxide fuel cell cathode reconstructions from focused ion beam tomography data

Sentencas: Special emphasis is turned on adequate SEM image resolution, on representative volume elements essential for trustworthy results and on important aspects of the numerical simulation.
Titulo: Representative volume element size for accurate solid oxide fuel cell cathode reconstructions from focused ion beam tomography data

Sentencas: Our corrected reconstruction data set represents a volume of similar to 2800 mu m(3) and contains similar to 96 x 10(6) voxels.
Titulo: Representative volume element size for accurate solid oxide fuel cell cathode reconstructions from focused ion beam tomography data

Sentencas: This data set is then used for calculating: (i) volume-specific surface area of the LSCF cathode, (ii) volume/porosity fraction, and (iii) tortuosity of LSCF and pores at a constant base area, but for an increasing height of the reconstructed electrode.
Titulo: Representative volume element size for accurate solid oxide fuel cell cathode reconstructions from focused ion beam tomography data

Sentencas: Moreover, the course of these microstructure parameters is calculated independently for three representative volume elements.
Titulo: Representative volume element size for accurate solid oxide fuel cell cathode reconstructions from focused ion beam tomography data
